-------------------------

**Notice Type**
----------------
This is a Request for Standing Offer (RFO) and a reissue of an earlier solicitation (DOC4452476059) which previously expired on March 11, 2024.

**Procurement Overview**
-----------------------

The Canadian government, represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites bids from service suppliers to provide Audio-Visual Event Support services. The contract, advertised under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), is open to bidders under the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) trade agreements.

**Goods and Services**
---------------------

The procurement involves the supply of video and audiovisual presentation equipment, including hardware and accessories, as well as educational materials on audio tapes. In addition, audiovisual services will be purchased to support the organization of events.

**Contract Information**
-------------------------

* Contract Start Date: 2024-12-01
* Contract End Date: None
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price offered by the service supplier.

**Attachment**
----------------

No attachments are associated with this tender notice.

**Contact Information**
------------------------

For further details, please refer to the official notice on [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19187663?extsite=MTkxODc2NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19187663?extsite=MTkxODc2NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Contact information for advise regarding this tender opportunity, or to request a debriefing session, is available through Jessica Canas at jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
